description: When it comes to homemade hash browns, these certainly deliver the crisp factor while being soft and tender on the inside.
keywords: Potato cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Aug 2022,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hash Browns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs sage, chopped, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Coarsely grate the potatoes onto a clean tea towel, then squeeze out the excess liquid by twisting the towel.
Transfer potato to a bowl. Add egg and sage and stir to combine. Season.
Heat oil in a heavy-based frying pan. Add large spoonfuls of the mixture for 2-3 minutes or until golden and crisp, then turn and cook for a further 2-3 minutes.
Fry extra sage leaves until crisp to garnish. Serve.
